entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
